Newton.WGBH-TV: WGBH-TV, virtual channel 2 (UHF digital channel 19), is a PBS member television station located in Boston, Massachusetts, United States. The station is owned by, and is the flagship property of, the WGBH Educational Foundation, which also owns fellow PBS stations WGBX-TV (channel 44) in Boston and WGBY-TV (channel 57) in Springfield, Massachusetts, and public radio stations WGBH (89.7 FM) and WCRB (99.5 FM) in the Boston area, and WCAI (90.1 FM) (and satellites WZAI and WNAN) in Cape Cod. WGBH maintains studio facilities (which it shares with WGBX and the WGBH and WCRB radio stations) located on Guest and Market Streets in the Brighton neighborhood of Boston, and its transmitter is located at 350 Cedar Street (southwest of Interstate 95) in Needham, Massachusetts.
